title: More Than 300 DNC Delegates for Bernie Sanders Push Senator to Call for Ceasefire in Gaza
description:
The letter is the latest push from Democratic Party insiders to bring recalcitrant leaders around to calling for a ceasefire.

The post More Than 300 DNC Delegates for Bernie Sanders Push Senator to Call for Ceasefire in Gaza appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Google Activists Circulated Internal Petition on Israel Ties. Only the Muslim Got a Call from HR.
description:
Employees are internally protesting Google’s Project Nimbus, which they fear is being used by Israel to violate Palestinians’ human rights.

The post Google Activists Circulated Internal Petition on Israel Ties. Only the Muslim Got a Call from HR. appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Cop City Protesters Tried to Plant Trees. Atlanta Police Beat Them for It.
description:
Organizers swore off violence, but the cops used their garden tools as an excuse to attack them anyway.

The post Cop City Protesters Tried to Plant Trees. Atlanta Police Beat Them for It. appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The Gaza Siege: A Harsh Spotlight on the West’s Moral Bankruptcy
description:
Journalist Sharif Abdel Kouddous discusses the slaughter in Gaza, and Ta-Nehisi Coates describes his visit to Palestine.

The post The Gaza Siege: A Harsh Spotlight on the West’s Moral Bankruptcy appeared first on The Intercept.
